auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Weka anwani yako ya barua pepe na tutakutumia maelekezo ya kuweka upya nywila yako.
auth.resetEmailSent: Barua Pepe ya Kuweka Upya Imetumwa
auth.resetEmailInstructions: Tafadhali angalia barua pepe yako kwa maelekezo ya kuweka upya nywila yako.
auth.requestNewReset: Omba Kiungo Kipya cha Kuweka Upya
auth.invalidResetToken: Kiungo cha Kuweka Upya Batili au Kimeisha

errors.passwordTooShort: Nywila lazima iwe na herufi 8 au zaidi
errors.somethingWentWrong: Kitu kimekwenda vibaya. Tafadhali jaribu tena.

validation.maxLength: {{field}} lazima iwe na herufi {{max}} au chache
validation.email: Tafadhali weka anwani ya barua pepe halali
validation.password: Nywila lazima iwe na herufi 8 au zaidi na iwe na herufi kubwa moja, herufi ndogo moja, nambari moja, na herufi maalum moja
